title: LFI from bypassing image parser and faking HEAD response with redirection

profile.name: BugPoC
profile.about: A Platform to Build and Share Proof-of-Concepts for Bug Bounty Submissions, PenTest Deliverables, & Red Team Reports.

vulnerability_information:
## Summary:
[add summary of the vulnerability]
By specially crafted request, a fake python3 http server and exploit.py we can read any files from the server

## Supporting Material/References:
[list any additional material (e.g. screenshots, logs, etc.)]
Bugpoc id: bp-HdMxEwwr  (bp-HdMxEwwr)
Bugpoc pass:  lEGalmaNgO99
  * [attachment / reference]
In url form this: https://bugpoc.com/poc#bp-HdMxEwwr

activities.message:
Thanks for participating in our CTF Challenge! Your solution is correct, however unfortunately the 1st, 2nd, and 3rd place prizes have already been claimed. But do not worry - **your name has been entered into a Raffle to win $100!** 6 random winners will be announced on **October 6th**. Stay tuned- we will re-open and award this submission if you win!

Reminder - the best blog write-up about this challenge will win $200! Submit yours *10/05 12pm EDT - 10/07 12PM EDT* by tagging @bugpoc_official on Twitter.

BTW, in the future, the [Mock Endpoint](https://bugpoc.com/testers/other/mock) feature is great for setting up maintenance-free server responses! :)
activities.markdown_message:
Thanks for participating in our CTF Challenge! Your solution is correct, however unfortunately the 1st, 2nd, and 3rd place prizes have already been claimed. But do not worry - your name has been entered into a Raffle to win $100! 6 random winners will be announced on October 6th. Stay tuned- we will re-open and award this submission if you win!

Reminder - the best blog write-up about this challenge will win $200! Submit yours 10/05 12pm EDT - 10/07 12PM EDT by tagging @bugpoc_official on Twitter.

BTW, in the future, the Mock Endpoint feature is great for setting up maintenance-free server responses! :)

activities.message: Thanks again for participating in our challenge. This CTF was a ton of fun to make and we hope you enjoyed completing it. Unfortunately your solution was not chosen in the random raffle. Stay tuned- we plan on doing another CTF soon! Happy hacking!
